articles.title: 5 Places to Channel the Olympic Spirit Without Attending the Games in Italy
articles.description: Can’t make it to Italy for the Winter Olympics? No worries, these spots in North America offer a taste of the Games (and let you try everything from speedskating to ski jumping, if you dare).
articles.content: Can’t make it to Italy for the Winter Olympics? No worries, these spots in North America offer a taste of the Games (and let you try everything from speedskating to ski jumping, if you dare).

articles.title: In Norway, Skiing Through a Winter Wonderland
articles.description: A 100-mile journey along the country’s Troll Trail includes stunning vistas, snowbound mountain hotels and waffles.
articles.content: A 100-mile journey along the country’s Troll Trail includes stunning vistas, snowbound mountain hotels and waffles.
